            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'basename' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{basename:$Params}" , 
                                    basename( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' ) ) , 
                                    $Str
                              );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }

Definition at line 144 of file fs_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'file_name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'image_path' , $Limitations ) ) !== false ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              $FileName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_name' );
                              
                              if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' , false ) === false )
                              {
                                    $TemplatePath = $this->PageComposer->get_template_path();
                                    $RealFilePath = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_file_path( 
                                          $TemplatePath."/res/images/$FileName" , false
                                    );
                                    if( $RealFilePath === false )
                                    {
                                          $PageComposerFilePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' );
                                          $RealFilePath = $PageComposerFilePath."/res/images/$FileName";
                                          if( file_exists( $RealFilePath ) === false )
                                          {
                                                throw( new Exception( "File '$FileName' was not found" ) );
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $PackageFilePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
                                    );
                                    $RealFilePath = $PackageFilePath."/res/images/$FileName";
                                    if( file_exists( $RealFilePath ) === false )
                                    {
                                          throw( new Exception( "File '$FileName' was not found" ) );
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{image_path:$Params}" , $RealFilePath , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
